nodes.bodyText: ❗ Based on the check above, meterRegistry can be null and thus, we need to protect ourselves here since we will end up with a lot of NPEs. On top of that, all the counters and other metrics objects will result in NPE later.

❗ We should have one query counter use different tag values to represent the type of query: federated, comparison, spatial, path, fuzzy, temporal, function. If some of those can be combined (i.e. not mutually exclusive), then let's use separate tags with a true or false value.
❗ The next 3 counters seems to be the same counter with different reasons. We should have one counter for tracking errors and then use different tag values for representing the reason.
❗ Similar for the next 3. They seemed to be the same counter with different operation tag values.
❗ Can we add a tag to all these counters to identify the source?
❗ javadoc for class and public methods/constructors
❗ javadoc for class and public methods and ctors
Should this say "A DistributionSummary can be used instead..."?
Does this conflict need to be resolved still?
can we do number of queries instead of amount of queries?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+:title: Prometheus Endpoint
+:type: endpoint
+:status: published
+:link: _prometheus_endpoint
+:operations: metrics
+:summary: Exposes a Prometheus endpoint of ${branding} metrics.
+:order: 10
+
+== {title}
+
+The Prometheus endpoint provides various metrics about ${branding} such as the amount of queries made
